name: A Warden's Struggles
description:
Theme for GMTK 2020 was "Out of Control" In this game, you play as a prison warden at Prison AOC. The inmates have rigged the security system, and are now trying to escape. Re-capture the prisoners while navigating around obstacles and dodging laser blasts from the rigged security bots!

My first ever game-jam, as well as first complete game. Since I'm very new to game development, there are definitely a lot of bugs, which I would gladly appreciate feedback and help for. My discord is MiriahTaro #9897, for anyone willing to help me and answer my questions. Thanks in advance!!

Disclaimer: None of the art and music (except character pixel art) belongs to me. I took them off of free asset libraries online. All credit for art and music belong to the respective owners.
